‘ithi’ shabda ho haraneyi bahumantha, boho manthra athiyawuhu- boho dena ha sasandili athiyawu hu yu seyi; kalassewa, kal athiyehi me; uththarummare, udaliyehi; dukkhabhibhutha kale, dukin kala kulu kalhi; wibhathakkhine, pahan wu kenehi pakkadithaya ukkhaliya, kakiyana ikiliyehi; samapariwachchakan pachchamaාna, perali perali pasenuwo; bherawasadda, biya janana handahu; imesan me athuren; nippanthin, nipan - palaya yu seyi; sabbasatha yanynyan, saw siya uwaranin katayuthu yaga 5 wachchathara sathani, nahambau siyo; wachchathari sathani, nahambai siyo; thunupanithani, tambaahi bandana laduwo; pesso, kamsanin enu yanuwo; assumukha, kandulu musu munu athiyo; padawi udrioyana saddowiya, polo palena handa baduyayi yeth me; idrinayani apakathikathi, sakaa induro piyiwihi nositiyawuhu; kilantha rupaniwiya, kalath sabhawu athi banduwawu; donapakan, thimbaak salehi bath; wisu radesu, kasi6 kosol derathi; dhura wihare, weth wehera; kuthonu, kawara?
oyawa apen aath kara gaththe...
aarthika widyawe nithara bhawitha wana yedum wishala sankhyawak pilibandawa patakayinta niwaradi danumak labadimata athi kuda wishwa koshayaki.
gaweshanaye nawathama prathipala pawathna thorathuru samanga sambandha karagath tharuka widyagnyayo, apage suryaya samipayen gaman ganna tharu pilibandawa maha parimana paryeshanayak aarambha kalaha.
ithin ee kriyakarakam arambaannata pera oba me lipiya kiyawiya yuthuyi.

lankawata da ewani prathipala kramayen 1970 n pasuwa paminiye, batahira ratawala sita gena ena lada ewani asabhya sangara menma indahita merata horen mudranaya kala poth path ha batahira asabhya sinamawa heyini.

wasarakatath wada adu kala parichchedayak athulatha me sa wishala jana sankhyawak nawatha mulgam bimwala padinchi kirima pilibandawa eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya pawa rajayata prashansawa pala kara athayi da mejar janaralwaraya pawasiya.wawuniyawa wanni aarakshaka sena mulasthanaye eeye (24) pawathi wishesha madhya hamuwedi mejar janaralwaraya me bawa kiya.nawatha mul gambimwalata padinchiyata yamata niyamithawa aththe mulathiwhi pudumathalan wani darunu satan pawathi pradeshawala janaya bawa penwa dun ohu eewaye da me wasara awasan wimata prathama ema piris padinchi karawima rajaye apekshawa bawa da sandahan kaleya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage ha aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahathage soya balima matha mema wadapiliwela kadinamin siduwana bawada ee mahatha kiya.bim bomba iwath kota pudgalayin nawatha padinchi kirimedi siyayata siyayaka aarakshawak labadimen pasu mema padinchi kirim sidu kala bawa da ohu kiya.jathika sanwardhanaya pilibanda madhya madhyasthanaye adhyakshaka janaral aariya rubasinha, rajaye prawruththi adhyakshaka wasanthapi්raya ramanayaka, karnal shantha kahagalla yana mahathwaru da sahabhagi wuha..
